column2: PIA - Yeast Gold Standard Benchmark Dataset
This Dataset is no actual new study but the Yeast Gold Standard benchmark dataset used in the PIA manuscript.
The sample was processed as described in Ramakrishnan, S. R. et al., Integrating shotgun proteomics and mRNA expression data to improve protein identification. Bioinformatics 2009, 25, (11), 1397-403
column3: For these runs the RAW files were converted to mzML using the msConvertGUI and further processed to MGF files using OpenMS. For the identification a precursor tolerance of 25 ppm, a fragment tolerance of 0.5 Da, one missed cleavage and the variable modifications for oxidation of M and protein N-terminal acetylation were allowed.

column2: Ruhr-Universität Bochum, Medical Faculty, Medizinisches Proteom-Center, Medical Bioinformatics / Functional Proteomics
